name: Notion /dividers: Basic Pack
description: What is this?Dividers in .png-format for you to make your Notion workspace your own!The Basic Pack includes 10 colours: all of the official Notion colours!For each colour, there are dividers with...- round and squared edges- with or without a shadow- thin, medium, and thick width.How do I use my new dividers?After checkout you will see a Notion doc with all the dividers in it. Duplicate it into your workspace. From there, you can copy and paste the ones you like to use them anywhere in your work
